rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究揭示美国各地 EMS 系统的护理不一致西奈山伊坎医学院的一项新研究表明，紧急医疗服务 (EMS) 系统并未始终如一地为拨打 911 的患者提供基于新国家质量标准的最佳护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/New-study-reveals-inconcient-care-in-EMS-systems-across-the-United-States.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/New-study-reveals-inconcient-care-in-EMS-systems-across-the-United-States.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b576baa3-3fa1-42a3-8469-a6f19d966449 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 13:30:00 -0500 New study reveals inconsistent care in EMS systems across the United States
百年进步：美国心脏协会的历史历程与未来方向美国心脏协会是世界领先的致力于所有人心脏和大脑健康的志愿组织，自 1924 年成立以来的 100 年来，对心血管疾病的认识和治疗取得了巨大进步，挽救了数百万人的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/A- century-of-progress-American-Heart-Associations-historic-journey-and-future-directions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/A- century-of-progress-American-Heart-Associations-historic-journey-and-future-directions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2e14131-b85a-4ddc-a82b-4bad1d2a7a2d Tue, 13 Feb 2024 12:58:55 -0500 A century of progress: American Heart Association's historic journey and future directions
在英格兰，非白人婴儿的死亡风险更大布里斯托大学领导的一项新研究显示，如果英格兰所有婴儿的死亡风险与白人婴儿相同，那么英格兰百分之十二的婴儿死亡是可以避免的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Infants-of-non-White-ethnicities-are-at-greater-risk-of-death-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Infants-of-non-White-ethnicities-are-at-greater-risk-of-death-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc032a50-ebc9-4f1f-8158-271141126b23 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 12:40:35 -0500 Infants of non-White ethnicities are at greater risk of death in England
研究显示寄养青少年中智力障碍的比例很高与同龄人相比，接受寄养的青少年在成年后遭受心理健康诊断、创伤和更糟糕结果的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-reveals-high-rates-of-intellectual-disability-among-youth-in-foster-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-reveals-high-rates-of-intellectual-disability-among-youth-in-foster-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=230a8028-249d-48f4-b0cd-176e74be894d Tue, 13 Feb 2024 11:41:36 -0500 Study reveals high rates of intellectual disabilities among youth in foster care
用燕麦粉制成的低糖巧克力与普通巧克力相同或更好宾夕法尼亚州立大学研究人员的一项新研究表明，用较少的糖制作美味巧克力的秘诀是燕麦粉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Reduced-sugar-chocolate-made-with-oat-flour-erated-equal-or-better-than-regular-chocolate.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Reduced-sugar-chocolate-made-with-oat-flour-erated-equal-or-better-than-regular-chocolate.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13cf7fc7-359b-4c39-8208-b9dd53e5c061 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 11:32:25 -0500 Reduced-sugar chocolate made with oat flour rated equal or better than regular chocolate
URI 研究探讨了消费者对加工食品的看法和营养超加工食品占美国人平均食用食物的一半以上。包括冷冻和预制食品、大多数包装零食、甜点和碳酸软饮料，但也包括更多无毒食品，它们通常被认为是健康饮食的祸根，几乎不含甚至不含为健康身体提供能量的营养。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/URI-study-explores-consumer-perceptions-and-nutrition-of-processed-foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/URI-study-explores-consumer-perceptions-and-nutrition-of-processed-foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bba8525c-db4a-465d-9174-3c088b0fb026 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 11:27:03 -0500 URI study explores consumer perceptions and nutrition of processed foods
机器学习工具利用 MRI 脑部扫描预测精神病的发作使用机器学习工具可以在精神病发作之前进行预测，该工具可以将 MRI 脑部扫描分为健康人群和有精神病发作风险的人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Machine-learning-tool-predicts-onset-of-psychosis-using-MRI-brain-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Machine-learning-tool-predicts-onset-of-psychosis-using-MRI-brain-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54648e5a-b83e-4cc5-8962-379657805e7d Tue, 13 Feb 2024 11:17:42 -0500 Machine-learning tool predicts onset of psychosis using MRI brain scans
与财富相关的不平等对五岁以下儿童营养不良的影响《科学报告》中的一项新研究对这一领域进行了研究，探讨了两者在低收入和中等收入国家 (LMIC) 中的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/The-effect-of-wealth-lated-inequality-on-undernutrition-in-children-under- Five.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/The-effect-of-wealth-lated-inequality-on-undernutrition-in-children-under- Five.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6229c08b-38dd-4036-8f95-0da519ea9cd6 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 09:46:00 -0500 The effect of wealth-related inequality on undernutrition in children under five
童年欺凌造成的人际不信任与青少年的心理健康问题有关加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心和格拉斯哥大学共同领导的一项新研究发现，由于童年欺凌而对其他人产生强烈不信任的青少年，与其他青少年相比，在进入成年后出现严重心理健康问题的可能性要大得多。那些没有出现人际信任问题的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Interpersonal-distrust-from-childhood-bullying-linked-to-mental-health-problems-in-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Interpersonal-distrust-from-childhood-bullying-linked-to-mental-health-problems-in-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d949b5b1-f756-477f-b07f-c9685c9748c9 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:54:42 -0500 Interpersonal distrust from childhood bullying linked to mental health problems in teens
联合疗法为非小细胞肺癌治疗带来突破德克萨斯大学MD安德森癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，靶向治疗和免疫治疗的特定组合可以更好地帮助非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）患者克服固有的免疫抵抗并重振抗肿瘤活性中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Biomarker-Directed-Combination-Effective-In-Immunotherapy-Resistant-Lung-Cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Biomarker-Directed-Combination-Effective-In-Immunotherapy-Resistant-Lung-Cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da4a4e14-65da-4d54-aeac-b0908f605853 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:44:00 -0500 Combination therapy offers breakthrough in NSCLC treatment
